content:
I cannot predict the future, but it is possible that hockey east could rebound once the pandemic is over. many sports organizations and events have been impacted by the pandemic, and while they have faced significant challenges, they have also adapted to the changes and found new ways to succeed.

it is possible that once vaccines become widely available, the league will be able to resume normal operations and generate revenue from in-person events. it may take some time for the league to regain its footing, but with proper planning, effective management, and support from fans, sponsors, and other stakeholders, hockey east could bounce back.
